Kim Yong Nam Meets Indian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Indian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Rich Pal Singh, Indian ambassador e.p. to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present were DPRK Vice Foreign Minister Kim Yong Il and a staff member of the Indian embassy here.

articles.title: Congratulations to Spanish Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Spanish Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Jose Rodriguez Zapatero upon his assumption of office as prime minister of the Kingdom of Spain.
 The message wished him great success in his responsible work for the stability and progress of the country and the wellbeing of the Spanish people.
